propose to employ.from sentence: To overcome this , we propose to employ recurrent neural networks ( RNNs ) as convolution filters of CNN systems for various NLP tasks .

recurrent neural filters ( RNFs ).from sentence: Our recurrent neural filters ( RNFs ) can naturally deal with language compositionality with a recurrent function that models word relations , and they are also able to implicitly model long - term dependencies .

RNFs.from sentence: RNFs are typically applied to word sequences of moderate lengths , which alleviates some well - known drawbacks of RNNs , including their vulnerability to the gradient vanishing and exploding problems .

RNF - based CNN models.from sentence: As a result , RNF - based CNN models can be 3 - 8 x faster than their RNN counterparts .

computation of.from sentence: As in conventional CNNs , the computation of the convolution operation with RNFs can be easily parallelized .

two RNF - based CNN architectures.for: sentence classification and answer sentence selection problems
two RNF - based CNN architectures.from sentence: We present two RNF - based CNN architectures for sentence classification and answer sentence selection problems .
